resources.string:
This app represents our blog, which is also available on blog.vicious-dino.de.

 We are currently building VR games in our spare time and we use this blog to document our achievements and all kinds of intereseting stuff that comes across.

 We'd love to hear some feedback, feel free to contact us using one of the listed emails below, or via twitter.
